Instrument Interfaces¶

Implemented¶

  • pyvisa: for instruments that support VISA and communicate over USB, Ethernet and GPIB.
  • pyserial: for instruments that use RS-232 or USB-to-serial interface chips
  • Aardvark i2c controller

To-be Developed¶

  • OpenCV for cameras
  • Opal Kelly Front Panel
